WorkItem.Summary: Can't use region attribs from code

Comments.Message: Yeah, actually I was thinking about dropping the attribues array completely and instead have just a region marker. Never used the double array anyway. You could always do the computation of element attributes after triangulation. What do you think?
That sounds good. For the region marker, either have "int regionMarker", or perhaps even more useful would be "object regionMarker" - then you could store anything you liked in it, including an int.
